content: 26 27 27 27 row 9-10 cc1 28 28 29 sts bobble center 26 26 28 30 32 32 34 34 36 row 11-12 cc2 36 36 40 sts work to end row 13-14 cc1 you will now work the left shoulder only place the sts repeat row 1-14 for pattern for the right shoulder on a holder if desired work even as established decreasing 1 st at the neck edge back every rs row twice until armhole measures 6½ 7 7¼ co 86 90 98 102 110 114 122 126 134 138 142 7½ 8 8¼ 8½ 9 9¼ 9¾ 10 10½ /16 5 18 18 5 19 154 sts 20 5 21 21 5 23 23 5 25 25 5 26 5 cm and piece mea- next row rs knit 2 *p 2 k 2 repeat from * to end sures 21½ 22¼ 22¾ 23¼ 24 24½ 25 25½ 26¼ 26¾ next row ws purl 2 *k 2 p 2 repeat from * to end 27 27½ /54 5 56 5 58 59 61 62 63 5 65 66 5 68 continue in 2x2 ribbing until back measures 2 / 5 cm 68 5 70 cm from co edge ending with a rs row from co edge ending with a ws row next row ws bobble 10 10 10 11 12 12 13 13 13 switch to main pattern stitch of your choice and work 13 13 14 sts work to end work 1 rs row even bobble even until piece measures 2½ /6 cm from co edge end- rem 9 10 10 10 11 12 12 12 12 13 13 13 sts ing with a rs row re-attach yarn to ws of held sts and work as established next row ws purl 29 30 33 34 37 38 41 42 45 decreasing 1 st at the neck edge every rs row twice un- 46 47 51 sts pm purl 28 30 32 34 36 38 40 42 44 til armhole measures 6½ 7 7¼ 7½ 8 8¼ 8½ 9 9¼ 9¾ 46 48 52 sts pm purl 29 30 33 34 37 38 41 42 45 10 10½ /16 5 18 18 5 19 20 5 21 21 5 23 23 5 25 46 47 51 sts 25 5 26 5 cm and piece measures 21½ 22¼ 22¾ 23¼ decrease row rs work as established to 2 sts before 24 24½ 25 25½ 26¼ 26¾ 27 27½ /54 5 56 5 58 first marker ssk sm work to second marker sm k2tog 59 61 62 63 5 65 66 5 68 68 5 70 cm from co edge work to end two sts decreased ending with a ws row keeping pattern stitch as established if appropriate work next row rs bobble 10 10 10 11 12 12 13 13 13 decrease row every 10 row 5 times total 76 80 88 92 13 13 14 sts work to end work 1 ws row even bobble 100 104
